projects.name: Field Of Echoes
projects.description: A role-play, farming game developed as a final project and continued as a personal IT project. Involved character FSM, item, inventory, farming, trading, NPC dialog, crafting, placeable objects, item conversion, combat mechanics, and scene consistency.

projects.name: Quizza
projects.description: A simple 2D UI-focused quiz game developed to learn Unity UI and C#. Features question/answer panels, scriptable objects for data, score tracking, and game restart functionality.

projects.name: Maze Runner
projects.description: A 2D Mario-like tile-based game developed to learn Unity tile and tilemap system. Features player character, monsters, obstacles, score, lives, and stage progression with save/restore mechanics.
